channel.title: Think Rethink Play Podcast
channel.link:
http://www.rethinkgaming.com/ en-us by Rethink Gaming Jerry Pirkle and Bob McDowell Jerry, Bob, and the occasional guest discuss gaming topics. The RethinkGaming staff discuss gaming and pop culture topics. We're currently playing A lOT of Dungeons and Dragons, but anything gaming related is fair game. Join us on Patreon to get a shout out and let us know what you want to talk about!
Jerry Pirkle legendary.jerry@gmail.com
yes *
Think Rethink Play Podcast | Ep 1 | How to Railroad Your Players in DnD
Bob and Jerry discuss the topic of Agency in roleplaying games with stories, examples, and a little Q&A.
What is player agency? What is railroading? How do you balance telling the story that you want to tell with the actions of unpredictable demigod murder hobos? http://example.com/podcast-1
Sat, 12 Dec 2020 16:01:07 +0000 Jerry Pirkle 00:53:39 yes http://rethinkggaming.com/rss/ep1agency.mp4
